data.message: Hi, I am having problems sharing my post.

replies.message: Hey Alecia. Here are step-by-step instructions if you'd like to share a post from your News Feed: http://on.fb.me/1QZd2oV. Thanks! -Jordan

Facebook ,,,,Hello from Europe. I have a problem a few days with pictures on my pages. When I upload the image, the same image for a while disappeared on my page. I admin not see the picture. Fans of my page too not see picture. Similar problems too have my other friends who have a facebook pages. Please, do not send me any links to I must visit the help center, the problem is in Facebook, and you urgently need to fix this problem. I am very angry, because my pages lose activity due to your mistakes.
